Html:
I want to use it in XP. But while generating the Interop assembly from "schedsvc.dll"(and I am assuming this is the currect assembly in XP for task scheduler) throgh TlbImp, I am getting error that 'Not a valid Type Library"?

Can anyone give me some idea on this?

You are in luck because you don't need to create an Interop assembly to use this library. It is a completely managed library that includes all the interop code and binds at runtime with whichever version of the Task Scheduler is available on the machine.
